Gymglish | Engineering/Learning Tech | Paris, FRANCE | Full-Time | ONSITE

Gymglish is a Paris-based company founded in 2004. We offer innovative language learning solutions online (French and English) using personalized content, an expert learning system and a team of creative content writers. Our aim is to keep learners engaged and motivated thanks to fun, short, content personalized to their needs.

We're currently hiring for our Paris offices:

* Full Stack Python developer

* Front-End developer

* as well as other roles in UX/UI, Acquisition Marketing and Sales.

Everything is explained here (including funny video):

https://www.gymglish.com/en/jobs/
